title: tfim
description: MCW TFIM: t-tests on sets of functional images

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Prefix for output filenames. Default is 'tfim'.

pthresh.title: p-threshold
pthresh.description: Significance level (per voxel) to threshold the output with. Voxels with t-statistic less significant than this will have their diff output zeroed. Default is no threshold.

eqcorr.title: Equivalent correlation statistic
eqcorr.description: Write out the equivalent correlation statistic. The number 'dval' is the value to use for 'dof'. Default is not to write this file.

paired.title: Paired sample t-test
paired.description: Compare -set1 and -set2 using a paired sample t-test. Illegal with the -base1 option.

base1_value.title: Base value
base1_value.description: Base value for the first set of images. Used for Usage 2.
